about_the_game:
In the beginning, there was nothing. At least that’s what they’d want you to think. In truth, in the beginning, there was The Constant, within which a gunshot rang through, creating the universe of today...


Learn more about the development of Genesis Noir with the game’s very own digital art book, An Act of Creation.

An Act of Creation is a behind-the-scenes look at the making of this artful noir adventure! Its pages are filled with concept art, storyboards, sheet music, production screenshots, artist's insights, reflections from the creators, and so much more!

Uncover the artistic process behind Genesis Noir. See everything from the smallest of designs to the sprawling concepts for this cosmic adventure.

To access this digital art book:

  • Right click Genesis Noir in your Steam Library
  • Select Manage
  • Select Browse Local Files
  • Open Genesis Noir - An Act of Creation.pdf
If automatic updates are turned off, please update the Genesis Noir base game first on Steam.

The art book and all other DLC will also be available in a The Cosmic Collection bundle, upon launch!
